Name: Dive
Effect: Single Target. Charge Move. Out of Range while Charging. Vulnerable while Charging to: 'Scald', 'Surf', 'Whirlpool', 'Freeze-Dry', 'Sheer Cold'. Out of Battle, allows the Pok√©mon to move underwater carrying someone without risk of drowning.
Description: The user submerges into the water and continues diving at an insane speed.
